The Last of Us 2 represents how games sh: Let me say that I didn't see any spoilers/leaks before my play through and did not watch any reviews on the game until i finished it. Now the gameplay in my opinion is very very smooth and only gets boring for me at the end of the game\, when you get to play as Ellie again. My high points were fighting the rat king as abby\, the car scene with Jesse and the Chase scene with Dina on the end of the first day. Now to the people out there that are hating on the game\, half the people I hear complaining about it have not even played the game and just see how everyone is hating on it and watches one review and then says its a bad game. NO STOP IT\, play the game\, and then have your opinion. Now my honest thoughts on the game\, I loved it\, and thats enough. The ending wasnt unfullfilling\, if you were expecting the story to go the way you wanted/expected thats just wrong to think that way.
